summary: REQ-1 (remove duplicate volume input on Pre‑Meditation page) appears to be implemented via changes to the AmbientMusicCarousel/PreMeditation UI, but the diff also includes multiple unrelated UI/behavior changes that were explicitly listed as non-goals (dashboard quote persistence, button size reductions, Begin/Quiz behavior changes, Save-as-ritual visibility changes, circular timer, and other navigation/features).

hallucinated_features.description: Dashboard quote persistence/memoization so the quote does not change on carousel navigation
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly called out as a non-goal for this build, but implemented in DashboardPage via memoization of quote selection.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (DashboardPage.tsx: "Memoize the quote selection so it doesn't change on carousel navigation")

hallucinated_features.description: Dashboard Begin/Quiz behavior changes (Begin button text/behavior and quiz auto-navigation)
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly listed as a non-goal, but DashboardPage contains updated Begin handler logic and quiz completion auto-navigation to pre-meditation.

hallucinated_features.description: Reduced button sizes on Dashboard and/or Pre‑Meditation pages
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly listed as a non-goal, but the summary notes reduced button sizes (e.g., px-6 py-4 instead of px-8 py-6) and "reduced button sizes throughout".

hallucinated_features.description: Change 'Save as Ritual' visibility (moved to reflection view only / hidden until after meditation)
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly listed as a non-goal, but PreMeditationPage summary states this was changed.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (PreMeditationPage.tsx: "moved \"Save as Ritual\" button to reflection view only")

hallucinated_features.description: Circular meditation timer with progress fill/glow behavior
hallucinated_features.reason: Explicitly listed as a non-goal ("circular meditation timer"), but PreMeditationPage/ActiveMeditationPage summaries mention an active circular timer with progress fill and glow.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (PreMeditationPage.tsx: "active circular timer with progress-based fill and subtle glow")
frontend-file-summaries.txt (ActiveMeditationPage.tsx: "large circular timer with synchronized breathing anima...")

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new /knowledge route and floating navigation changes (Knowledge/Brain icon)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest and outside the stated single-change constraint; summaries mention a new /knowledge route and FloatingNav updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Landing page theme/background changes and authenticated auto-redirect behavior
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; LandingPage summary describes new background behavior and auth redirect logic.

hallucinated_features.description: Global CSS, Tailwind config, and multiple other UI component upgrades (LotusCanvas variants/intensity, FeatureCard icon filter, scrollbar styling, etc.)
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest and violates the constraint to apply changes only to the selected container/element.

hallucinated_features.description: Broad changes to React Query hooks (useQueries) including import/export, authenticated query behavior, rituals reconciliation, etc.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest and unrelated to removing a duplicate volume input.
